title: Strengthening Programming Competencies: Organizational Sustainability Leadership Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary business management knowledge and organizational operation experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain core principles of organizational sustainability (environmental, social, and economic aspects)
Learners can analyze practical cases integrating sustainability and STEM principles and apply them to decision-making
Learners can assess sustainability-related business risks and propose actionable improvement strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
